metadata.title: CVE-2024-45752 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Compliant (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: logiops through 0.3.4, in its default configuration, allows anyunprivileged user to configure its logid daemon via an unrestricted D-Busservice, including setting malicious keyboard macros. This allows forprivilege escalation with minimal user interaction.

criterions.comment: logiops package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
